name: Loco Ads
description: Local Classified Ads on Your Phone
overview:
We help our customers publish and find local classified ads straight from their phones.

Loco Ads is a free iPhone and Android app that lets our customers publish and pay for local classified ads wherever they are. The whole process of publishing, paying for and managing ads happens of the phone with no need to use the computer. Ads can be published in the area that the user is currently visiting or nationwide. A simple pricing structure helps the user complete the whole process in a couple of minutes.
